head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEONHARDT, WILLIAM STROUP

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEONHARDT, WILLIAM STROUP

block.p: LEONHARDT-William Stroup. On September 26, 2000 of Boca Raton, FL, formerly of Cranford and Westfield, NJ. Husband of the late Evelyn F. Leonhardt (1993), and father of the late William S. Leonhardt Jr. (1993). Cherished father of Lynne Toth, Geraldine Leonhardt, and Janet L. Small. Brother of Mary Moore, and Elizabeth Hutchinson. Grandfather of six and great-grandfather of two. Uncle of several nieces and nephews. Visitation Thursday from 24, 7-9 PM at The Gray Funeral Home, 318 East Broad Street, Westfield, NJ. Funeral Friday 11 AM at the funeral home with burial at Fairview Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations woulld be appreciated to any local hospice program.
